<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 8"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Heal Mount](/Feats.aspx?ID=5906) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Champion" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=811" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 97 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Prerequisites**
[Faithful Steed](/Feats.aspx?ID=5885); [_lay on hands_](/Spells.aspx?ID=2047)

</column>

---

Your devotion to your mount manifests as a surge of vital energy. When you cast [_lay on hands_](/Spells.aspx?ID=2047) on your mount, instead of the normal amount, the spell restores 10 Hit Points, plus 10 for each heightened rank.
name: Heal Mount
